aka: I Want to Be a Rock Star

cast.name: 弗朗西斯科·迪·雷蒙多 Francesco Di Raimondo

director.name: 马特奥·顾里图 Matteo Oleotto

trans_title: I Want to Be a Rock Star
introduction: Olivia is a twenty-seven year old girl in an existential crisis. In life she did everything in a hurry: first love disappointment at sixteen, simultaneously with the first pregnancy and then a job (since Nadja, her mother, is a lost freak) to become an adult and responsible, to raise her two twins, Emma and Viola, and a brother who is nothing short of slacker and manipulative, Eros, who hides from everyone that he is gay.
